languages.text: Представители Экклезиархии публично подтвердили чистоту Вольного Торговца перед Императором, и слухи сошли на нет.
Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.
languages.original_text: Представители Экклезиархии публично подтвердили чистоту Вольного Торговца перед Императором, и слухи сошли на нет.

traits.locale_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader is pure before the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.
Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.
Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.
Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.

languages.text: À peine les représentants de l'Ecclésiarchie confirment-ils publiquement la loyauté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} envers l'Empereur que les rumeurs inquiétantes se taisent.
languages.original_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.

traits.locale_text: À peine les représentants de l'Ecclésiarchie confirment-ils publiquement la loyauté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} envers l'Empereur que les rumeurs inquiétantes se taisent.

languages.text: 自由開拓者が依然として皇帝に仕える高潔な人物であることを帝国聖教会の代表が公に認めると、厄介な噂は鳴りを潜めた。
languages.original_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が依然として皇帝に仕える高潔な人物であることを帝国聖教会の代表が公に認めると、厄介な噂は鳴りを潜めた。

languages.text: 国教代表成员公开澄清，宣布行商浪人依然是忠于帝皇的仆人。在那之后，所有令人不安的谣言都慢慢平息下来。
languages.original_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.

traits.locale_text: 国教代表成员公开澄清，宣布行商浪人依然是忠于帝皇的仆人。在那之后，所有令人不安的谣言都慢慢平息下来。

languages.text: Cuando los representantes de la Eclesiarquía confirmaron que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente seguía sirviendo fielmente al Emperador, los perturbadores rumores cesaron.
languages.original_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.

traits.locale_text: Cuando los representantes de la Eclesiarquía confirmaron que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente seguía sirviendo fielmente al Emperador, los perturbadores rumores cesaron.

languages.text: Die Vertreter der Ekklesiarchie bestätigen öffentlich, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} weiterhin treu dem Imperator dient. Die beunruhigenden Gerüchte verschwinden daraufhin.
languages.original_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.

traits.locale_text: Die Vertreter der Ekklesiarchie bestätigen öffentlich, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} weiterhin treu dem Imperator dient. Die beunruhigenden Gerüchte verschwinden daraufhin.

languages.text: Ekleşiarşi temsilcileri tarafından Hür Tacir'in İmparator'un erdemli bir hizmetkârı olduğunun herkesin gözü önünde onaylaması, huzursuz edici dedikoduları ortadan kaldırdı.
languages.original_text: Once the Ecclesiarchy's representatives publicly confirmed that the Rogue Trader remained a virtuous servant of the Emperor, the troubling rumours died away.
